DESCRIPTION:
The game is The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing is in the dark gothic world, reminding Europe of the XIX century, but with monsters, magic and fancy technology. In this dark tale, full of black humor and lively dialogue, you will play the role of the son of the famous hunter Van Helsing - the outstanding character endowed with a dark mystery and charm. Your path will be in dire Borgovii land where former enemies mystical hero called upon him to help together to overcome the new threat hanging over the city in Western Europe. Vivid characters, exciting plot and a stunning gothic macabre style of play "The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing" return the lovers of classic RPG combat system and send them to a new unforgettable adventure!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GAME FEATURES:
" Enter the gloomy gothic unforgettable world filled with monsters, magic and supernatural knowledge
" Immerse yourself in the fascinating unique story told by your own character with grim 
humor, spiced with brilliant dialogue
, " Fight in the fierce battles to defeat your enemies through a variety of supernatural 
talents and skills
" Adapt your character through the careful tier system in which you can decide what 
skills you will need in your deeds
" Use special abilities and customize the unique skills of the follower
" Release your anger to become even stronger and more skilful
" Learn the secrets of the mystical alchemy and invent things that increase your strength
" Arrange comfortably in your den hunting and decorate their shelter in various valuable trophies
" Become the greatest fighter of all time monsters, playing together in a network to hunt for monsters 
with up to four players
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
